title: Relaxing Kooralbyn Escape with Daily Breakfast & Fun Family Activities
description:
Treat the whole family to a relaxing escape at The Kooralbyn Valley, located just a short drive from the sun-kissed Gold Coast, among the stunning Scenic Rim hinterland. Home to an award-winning golf course and a long list of great facilities to keep all ages entertained, The Kooralbyn Valley is the perfect choice for a family holiday in the sun.

The picturesque surrounding area offers a variety of wineries, bush walks and even a few mountain climbing routes, all within easy driving distance of the resort. Although you don’t need to leave the resort to experience adventure: an array of great onsite activities are available, ranging from buggy tours to bush dancing, an Aussie muster show, koala habitat exploring and an acclaimed golf course.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Wake up to delicious daily buffet breakfast for two at Lilies Restaurant & Bar
- Take a swing with two hours of putt-putt for two
- Hit the water with two hours of kayaking for two
- Enjoy two hours of bowling for two
- Make the most of your holiday with 12pm late checkout (on request, subject to availability)

**Travelling with family?** Your Family Suite can sleep up to two additional guests for a surcharge, see package options for details.

title: Queensland Scenic Rim Golf Resort Escape with Daily Breakfast & Driving Range Session
description: Embrace tranquility at the heart of the serene Scenic Rim and unwind in the largest rammed earth eco-construction in the Southern Hemisphere, complete with a renowned tavern, pool and spa, all nestled within 800 acres of blissful surroundings. Just a 90-minute drive from the sun-kissed Gold Coast and Brisbane, the picturesque surrounding area offers a variety of wineries, bush walks and even a few mountain-climbing routes, all within easy driving distance of the resort. Although you don’t need to leave the resort to experience adventure: an array of great onsite activities are available, ranging from golf buggy tours to bush dancing, country farm experiences and giant chess.

title: Queensland Scenic Rim Golf Resort Escape with Daily Breakfast & Adventure Activities
description:
Treat the whole family to a relaxing escape at The Kooralbyn Valley amid the stunning Scenic Rim hinterland, just a 1.5-hour drive from the sun-kissed Gold Coast. Home to an award-winning golf course (named #1 Resort Golf Course in Queensland - Golf Course Guide Top 100 Courses 2019) and a long list of great facilities to keep all ages entertained, The Kooralbyn Valley is the perfect choice for a family holiday in the sun.

The picturesque surrounding area offers a variety of wineries, bush walks and even a few mountain climbing routes, all within easy driving distance of the resort. Although you don’t need to leave the resort to experience adventure: an array of great onsite activities are available, ranging from buggy tours to bush dancing, country farm experiences and giant chess.

title: Relaxing Family Escape with Daily Breakfast & Exciting Activities
description:
Treat the whole family to a relaxing escape at The Kooralbyn Valley, located just a short drive from sun-kissed Gold Coast. Set amongst the stunning scenic rim hinterland, home to an award-winning golf course and complete with a long list of luxe facilities that will have the whole family entertained, The Kooralbyn Valley is the perfect choice for a family holiday in the sun.

Wake up to daily breakfast and rest easy with a guaranteed 1pm late checkout. Your package also includes 18 holes of golf on the resort’s spectacular award-winning course, or a choice of family-friendly activities such as bush dancing, star gazing, or a live Australian muster show.

**Perfect for families:** Two kids (aged 11 years and under) stay free in existing bedding (one king and one sofa bed).
